features: ✔【STREAM ANYWHERE BY WIRELESS WEBCAM】Gsou wireless live streaming camera come with detachable telescopic tripod stand and a 2.4GHz USB receiver, the transmission distance is up to 65ft, the system also built-in microphone,picks up your voice within 2 meters of range clearly, making communication easy and natural for you. Wireless Webcam for PC/Mac/Laptop/MacBook/Conference TV, Common Smart TV need to download video conferencing software to use.

✔【Fixed Focus & 1080P WEBCAM, without Zoom Function】The conference web camera adopting high-quality HD CMOS sensor, effective pixels 2 million, delivers 1080p frame rate 30FPS.The streaming webcam also supports H.264 encoding which makes motion video fluent and clear even under less than ideal bandwidth conditions

✔【9-HOURS WORKING TIME】The webcam with Tripod Stand built-in 5200mAh rechargeable battery, extra long working time up to 9 hours on a single charge, never interrupt your video even power failure.(Note: Fully charge the item need about 4-5 Hours(1.5-2.0A, DC 5V output ), and webcam should last up to 9 hours playtime.)
✔【ALL AROUND PROTECTION】Gsou streaming camera adopted advanced 2.4GHz FHSS and digital encryption technology,100% keep your privacy, you don’t need to worry about hacking risks

✔【PLUG AND PLAY & GREAT COMPATIBILITY】No driver required. Our laptop wireless webcam is widely works with Windows XP SP3/2000/ 7/8/10, Mac OS, Chrome OS, Android V 5.0 or later, Ubuntu Linux 10.04 or later. Compatible with most video calling applications, Zoom, Skype for Business, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, GoToMeeting, Cisco Webex, Facetime, Facebook live, YouTube, OBS, Xbox one, Youtube, Xsplit, Twitter, Twitch, Whatsapp, Android IPTV, etc

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gsou Wireless Webcam (USB Video Class Webcam / UVC Protocol) More cares abount Wireless Webcam (USB Video Class Webcam / UVC Protocol) Type-C USB Receiver link to PC/Mac/Laptop/MacBook/Conference TV, Common Smart TV need to download video conferencing software to use.
Fixed Focus, without zoom function. (Note: It's apply for Zoom Meeting )

Gsou Wireless Webcam (USB Video Class Webcam / UVC Protocol) with Multiple Install Ways Wireless Webcam for PC/Mac/Laptop/MacBook/Conference TV, Common Smart TV need to download video conferencing software to use.

Possible Issues You May Encounter Question 1: The product will not charge, and why nothing will make the light a solid red (as it has in the past)? Answer: The low voltage indicator light on the front side of the lens, and the charging indicator light on the back of the charging port. If the charging indicator light flashes, it means the battery has not been activated, and the battery is using too low voltage protection; Please charge slowly and for a longer time to see if you can activate the battery. When fully charged, the flashing light in front will return to its original state. Question 2: Can you tell me under normally circumstance how long does it take to charge the camera if the battery is completed depleted? Answer: Fully charge the item need about 4-5 Hours(1.5-2.0A, DC 5V output ), and webcam should last up to 9 hours playtime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good web cam.
reviews.reviewText: Camera works well. Picture is very clear and microphone audio quality is very good. The zoom capability is useful. Only complaint is that the camera does not remember the zoom level, so have to push the button to reset it to the desired level for each session. A minor compliant, but would be nice if it was not necessary to adjust each time. Camera was available at a reasonable price and is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gsou Wireless Webcam
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Gsou Wireless Webcam, and I must say, it has been pretty good.Stable connectivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome web cam
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing, good quality, awesome value and very flexible. Previously had a logitech c270 that I didn't like because it blocked my screen and I could not adjust the view. Not the case here. This cam (Gsou 2K 5MP Zoomable Web cam) sits above my screen gives solid video quality and had lots of options so you can get the perfect view. I love that the zoom and focus are manual so I can dial it in like I want it. When in google meets I can tap the zoom to get the perfect crop that I want. I know it has some upgraded models like bluetooth but my pc supports that so this base model with all of its viewing flexibility was perfect for me. I turn it on, pop in my bluetooth ear buds and I am ready to rock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not last!
reviews.reviewText: Received this in April have only used it a few times and it no longer functions. It does not hold a charge and will not stay connected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice webcam. Like the zoom. Seller was good on responding

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for multi-use video meetings
reviews.reviewText: I assist in broadcasting our weekly church service and recently found out Zoom offers "music mode" for Windows and, subsequently, found this. I typically use an iPhone with a 3x add-on zoom lens, and this offers similar function. I also like that I can quickly change it to 1x/2x for groups. The built-in microphone is fairly sensitive and works well enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality camera, but I had to return it because it did not work for the job that we need to get done but I highly recommend it
